card.name: Abyssal Specter
card.text: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Adarkar Sentinel
card.text: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Adarkar Unicorn
card.text: {T}: Add {U} or {1}{U} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to pay cumulative upkeep costs.

card.name: Adarkar Wastes
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Aegis of the Meek
card.text: {1}, {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Aggression
card.text: Enchant non-Wall creature Enchanted creature has first strike and trample. At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, destroy that creature if it didn't attack this turn.

card.name: Altar of Bone
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Altar of Bone, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Amulet of Quoz
card.text: Remove Amulet of Quoz from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}, Sacrifice Amulet of Quoz: Target opponent may add the top card of his or her library to the ante. If he or she doesn't, you flip a coin. If you win the flip, that player loses the game. If you lose the flip, you lose the game. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Anarchy
card.text: Destroy all white permanents.

card.name: Arctic Foxes
card.text: Creatures with power 2 or greater can't block Arctic Foxes as long as defending player controls a snow land.

card.name: Arcum's Sleigh
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate this ability only during combat and only if defending player controls a snow land.

card.name: Arcum's Weathervane
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target snow land is no longer snow. {2}, {T}: Target nonsnow basic land becomes snow.

card.name: Arcum's Whistle
card.text: {3}, {T}: Choose target non-Wall creature the active player has controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn. That player may pay {X}, where X is that creature's converted mana cost. If he or she doesn't, the creature attacks this turn if able, and at the beginning of the next end step, destroy it if it didn't attack. Activate this ability only before attackers are declared.

card.name: Arenson's Aura
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment. {3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.

card.name: Armor of Faith
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Arnjlot's Ascent
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {U} {1}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Ashen Ghoul
card.text: Haste {B}: Return Ashen Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if three or more creature cards are above Ashen Ghoul.

card.name: Aurochs
card.text: Trample Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

card.name: Avalanche
card.text: Destroy X target snow lands.

card.name: Balduvian Conjurer
card.text: {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Balduvian Hydra
card.text: Balduvian Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. Remove a +1/+0 counter from Balduvian Hydra: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Balduvian Hydra this turn. {R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+0 counter on Balduvian Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Balduvian Shaman
card.text: {T}: Change the text of target white enchantment you control that doesn't have cumulative upkeep by replacing all instances of one color word with another. That enchantment gains "Cumulative upkeep {1}."

card.name: Barbarian Guides
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Choose a land type. Target creature you control gains snow landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn. Return that creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Barbed Sextant
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Baton of Morale
card.text: {2}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn.

card.name: Battle Cry
card.text: Untap all white creatures you control. Whenever a creature blocks this turn, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Battle Frenzy
card.text: Green creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Nongreen creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Binding Grasp
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Binding Grasp unless you pay {1}{U}. You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +0/+1.

card.name: Black Scarab
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by black creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.

card.name: Blessed Wine
card.text: You gain 1 life. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Blinking Spirit
card.text: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.

card.name: Blizzard
Blue Scarab
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by blue creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a blue permanent.

card.name: Bone Shaman
card.text: {B}: Until end of turn, Bone Shaman gains "Creatures dealt damage by Bone Shaman this turn can't be regenerated this turn."

card.name: Brainstorm
card.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Brand of Ill Omen
Breath of Dreams
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {U} Green creatures have "Cumulative upkeep {1}."

card.name: Brine Shaman
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Brown Ouphe
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source.

card.name: Brushland
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Burnt Offering
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Burnt Offering, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R} to your mana pool, where X is the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Call to Arms
card.text: As Call to Arms enters the battlefield, choose a color and an opponent. White creatures get +1/+1 as long as the chosen color is the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls but isn't tied for most common. When the chosen color isn't the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls or is tied for most common, sacrifice Call to Arms.

card.name: Caribou Range
card.text: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{W}{W}, {T}: Put a 0/1 white Caribou creature token onto the battlefield." Sacrifice a Caribou token: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Celestial Sword
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Centaur Archer
card.text: {T}: Centaur Archer deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Chaos Lord
card.text: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent gains control of Chaos Lord if the number of permanents is even. Chaos Lord can attack as though it had haste unless it entered the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Chaos Moon
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, count the number of permanents. If the number is odd, until end of turn, red creatures get +1/+1 and whenever a player taps a Mountain for mana, that player adds {R} to his or her mana pool. If the number is even, until end of turn, red creatures get -1/-1 and if a player taps a Mountain for mana, that Mountain produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

card.name: Chromatic Armor
card.text: Enchant creature As Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield, choose a color. Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield with a sleight counter on it. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by sources of the last chosen color. {X}: Put a sleight counter on Chromatic Armor and choose a color. X is the number of sleight counters on Chromatic Armor.

card.name: Chub Toad
card.text: Whenever Chub Toad blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Black
card.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
card.text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Green
card.text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Red
card.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: White
card.text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Clairvoyance
card.text: Look at target player's hand. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Cloak of Confusion
card.text: Enchant creature you control Whenever enchanted creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it assign no combat damage this turn. If you do, defending player discards a card at random.

card.name: Cold Snap
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Cold Snap deals damage to that player equal to the number of snow lands he or she controls.

card.name: Conquer
card.text: Enchant land You control enchanted land.

card.name: Cooperation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has banding.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Crown of the Ages
card.text: {4}, {T}: Attach target Aura attached to a creature to another creature.

card.name: Curse of Marit Lage
card.text: When Curse of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all Islands. Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Dance of the Dead
card.text: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Dance of the Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Dance of the Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield tapped under your control and attach Dance of the Dead to it. When Dance of the Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {1}{B}. If he or she does, untap that creature.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Death Ward
card.text: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Deflection
card.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

card.name: Demonic Consultation
card.text: Name a card. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

card.name: Despotic Scepter
card.text: {T}: Destroy target permanent you own. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Diabolic Vision
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Dire Wolves
card.text: Dire Wolves has banding as long as you control a Plains.

card.name: Disenchant
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Dread Wight
card.text: At end of combat, put a paralyzation counter on each creature blocking or blocked by Dread Wight and tap those creatures. Each of those creatures doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as it has a paralyzation counter on it. Each of those creatures gains "{4}: Remove a paralyzation counter from this creature."

card.name: Dreams of the Dead
card.text: {1}{U}: Return target white or black creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains "Cumulative upkeep {2}." If the creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

card.name: Drift of the Dead
card.text: Defender Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.

card.name: Drought
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drought unless you pay {W}{W}. Spells cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to cast for each black mana symbol in their mana costs. Activated abilities cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to activate for each black mana symbol in their activation costs.

card.name: Dwarven Armory
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +2/+2 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during any upkeep step.

card.name: Earthlink
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Earthlink unless you pay {2}. Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

card.name: Earthlore
card.text: Enchant land you control Tap enchanted land: Target blocking creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted land is untapped.

card.name: Elder Druid
card.text: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Elemental Augury
card.text: {3}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Elkin Bottle
card.text: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.

card.name: Elvish Healer
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. If that creature is green, prevent the next 2 damage instead.

card.name: Enduring Renewal
card.text: Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

card.name: Energy Storm
Enervate
card.text: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Errant Minion
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Errant Minion deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

card.name: Errantry
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and can only attack alone.

card.name: Essence Filter
card.text: Destroy all enchantments or all nonwhite enchantments.

card.name: Essence Flare
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Essence Vortex
card.text: Destroy target creature unless its controller pays life equal to its toughness. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Fanatical Fever
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Fear
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has fear.

card.name: Fiery Justice
card.text: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Target opponent gains 5 life.

card.name: Fire Covenant
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Fire Covenant, pay X life. Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

card.name: Flame Spirit
card.text: {R}: Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Flare
card.text: Flare deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Flooded Woodlands
card.text: Green creatures can't attack unless their controller sacrifices a land for each green creature he or she controls that's attacking.

card.name: Flow of Maggots
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} Flow of Maggots can't be blocked by non-Wall creatures.

card.name: Folk of the Pines
card.text: {1}{G}: Folk of the Pines gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Forbidden Lore
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Force Void
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Forgotten Lore
card.text: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {G}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Forgotten Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.

card.name: Formation
card.text: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Foul Familiar
card.text: Foul Familiar can't block. {B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.

card.name: Foxfire
card.text: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Freyalise Supplicant
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a red or white creature: Freyalise Supplicant deals damage to target creature or player equal to half the sacrificed creature's power, rounded down.

card.name: Freyalise's Charm
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a black spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, you draw a card. {G}{G}: Return Freyalise's Charm to its owner's hand.

card.name: Freyalise's Winds
card.text: Whenever a permanent becomes tapped, put a wind counter on it. If a permanent with a wind counter on it would untap during its controller's untap step, remove all wind counters from it instead.

card.name: Fumarole
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Fumarole, pay 3 life. Destroy target creature and target land.

card.name: Fylgja
card.text: Enchant creature Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it. Remove a healing counter from Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn. {2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Fylgja.

card.name: Fyndhorn Bow
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Fyndhorn Brownie
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Untap target creature.

card.name: Fyndhorn Elder
card.text: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Fyndhorn Elves
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Fyndhorn Pollen
Game of Chaos
card.text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 1 life and target opponent loses 1 life, and you decide whether to flip again. If you lose the flip, you lose 1 life and that opponent gains 1 life, and that player decides whether to flip again. Double the life stakes with each flip.

card.name: Gangrenous Zombies
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Gangrenous Zombies: Gangrenous Zombies deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you control a snow Swamp, Gangrenous Zombies deals 2 damage to each creature and each player instead.

card.name: Gaze of Pain
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may choose to have it deal damage equal to its power to a target creature. If you do, it assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: General Jarkeld
card.text: {T}: Switch the blocking creatures of two target attacking creatures. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

card.name: Ghostly Flame
card.text: Black and/or red permanents and spells are colorless sources of damage.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Trap Door Spider
card.text: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Giant Trap Door Spider and target creature without flying that's attacking you.

card.name: Glacial Chasm
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Pay 2 life. When Glacial Chasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Creatures you control can't attack. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Glacial Crevasses
card.text: Sacrifice a snow Mountain: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Glaciers
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Glaciers unless you pay {W}{U}. All Mountains are Plains.

card.name: Goblin Lyre
card.text: Sacrifice Goblin Lyre: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to target opponent equal to the number of creatures you control. If you lose the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to you equal to the number of creatures that opponent controls.

card.name: Goblin Mutant
card.text: Trample Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater. Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Goblin Sappers
card.text: {R}{R}, {T}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. Destroy it and Goblin Sappers at end of combat. {R}{R}{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. Destroy it at end of combat.

card.name: Goblin Ski Patrol
card.text: {1}{R}: Goblin Ski Patrol gets +2/+0 and gains flying. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once and only if you control a snow Mountain.

card.name: Goblin Snowman
card.text: Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn. {T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.

card.name: Gorilla Pack
card.text: Gorilla Pack can't attack unless defending player controls a Forest. When you control no Forests, sacrifice Gorilla Pack.

card.name: Gravebind
card.text: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Green Scarab
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by green creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a green permanent.

card.name: Grizzled Wolverine
card.text: {R}: Grizzled Wolverine gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step, only if at least one creature is blocking Grizzled Wolverine, and only once each turn.

card.name: Hallowed Ground
card.text: {W}{W}: Return target nonsnow land you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Halls of Mist
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} Creatures that attacked during their controller's last turn can't attack.

card.name: Heal
card.text: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Hecatomb
card.text: When Hecatomb enters the battlefield, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures. Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Hematite Talisman
card.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

card.name: Hipparion
card.text: Hipparion can't block creatures with power 3 or greater unless you pay {1}.

card.name: Hoar Shade
card.text: {B}: Hoar Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Hot Springs
card.text: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."

card.name: Howl from Beyond
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hurricane
card.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

card.name: Hyalopterous Lemure
card.text: {0}: Hyalopterous Lemure gets -1/-0 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Hydroblast
card.text: Choose one - Counter target spell if it's red; or destroy target permanent if it's red.

card.name: Hymn of Rebirth
card.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Ice Cauldron
card.text: {X}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Ice Cauldron and exile a nonland card from your hand. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. Note the type and amount of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Ice Cauldron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Ice Cauldron: Add Ice Cauldron's last noted type and amount of mana to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast the last card exiled with Ice Cauldron.

card.name: Ice Floe
card.text: You may choose not to untap Ice Floe during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature without flying that's attacking you. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Ice Floe remains tapped.

card.name: Iceberg
card.text: Iceberg enters the battlefield with X ice counters on it. {3}: Put an ice counter on Iceberg. Remove an ice counter from Iceberg: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Icequake
card.text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, Icequake deals 1 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Icy Manipulator
card.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Icy Prison
card.text: When Icy Prison enters the battlefield, exile target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Icy Prison unless any player pays {3}. When Icy Prison leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Illusionary Forces
card.text: Flying Cumulative upkeep {U}

card.name: Illusionary Presence
card.text: Cumulative upkeep {U} At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a land type. Illusionary Presence gains landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn.

card.name: Illusionary Terrain
Illusionary Wall
card.text: Defender, flying, first strike Cumulative upkeep {U}

card.name: Illusions of Grandeur
Imposing Visage
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Incinerate
card.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

card.name: Infernal Darkness
card.text: Cumulative upkeep - Pay {B} and 1 life. If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type.

card.name: Infernal Denizen
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice two Swamps. If you can't, tap Infernal Denizen, and an opponent may gain control of a creature you control of his or her choice for as long as Infernal Denizen remains on the battlefield. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as Infernal Denizen remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Infinite Hourglass
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Infinite Hourglass. All creatures get +1/+0 for each time counter on Infinite Hourglass. {3}: Remove a time counter from Infinite Hourglass. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

card.name: Infuse
card.text: Untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Jester's Cap
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Jester's Mask
card.text: Jester's Mask enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Mask: Target opponent puts the cards from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Search that player's library for that many cards. That player puts those cards into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Jeweled Amulet
card.text: {1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Jeweled Amulet. Note the type of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Jeweled Amulet. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Jeweled Amulet: Add one mana of Jeweled Amulet's last noted type to your mana pool.

card.name: Johtull Wurm
card.text: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

card.name: Jokulhaups
card.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Juniper Order Druid
card.text: {T}: Untap target land.

card.name: Justice

card.name: Pox
card.text: Each player loses a third of his or her life, then discards a third of the cards in his or her hand, then sacrifices a third of the creatures he or she controls, then sacrifices a third of the lands he or she controls. Round up each time.

card.text: Reach Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Word of Blasting
card.text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

card.name: Word of Undoing
card.text: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.

card.name: Wrath of Marit Lage
card.text: When Wrath of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all red creatures. Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Yavimaya Gnats
card.text: Flying {G}: Regenerate Yavimaya Gnats.

card.name: Zuran Enchanter
card.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Zuran Orb
card.text: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Zuran Spellcaster
card.text: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Zur's Weirding
card.text: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
